text: Refer to my memoir of riya's and treat it as yourss .... plzzz ğŸ˜ˆğŸ˜ˆ
author: Prakhar  Srivastava

text:
Okay Okay ,,,, Ab mai kyaa hi likhuu tumhare baare mai ................ aisa lgta hai ki bachpan se haar din hi dikhe ho tum school se coaching and phir college mai bhii ........ I remember our first talk in school after mso olympiad which I know you surely don't . Itne shaitaan hua krte the tum school mai ab toh kaafi sudhar gye ho. And the section change in 8th class is the best thing that happened like ever if now I think about it. JIO aane se itne saal phele hi phone pe ghanto laage rhete the hum dono(atleast padhai ko leke hi ğŸ¤£). Itni jayda pen fights and gossips. And mere upaar base(NaOH) girane ke liye shukriyaa abhi taak nishaan pdaa hua haii ğŸ˜‘.  I am so sorry for not being sorry that I revealed your secret so early (not able to resist ğŸ˜¶).
Chlo atleast tumhe aakhri aate aate taak iitk mil hi gyaa wrna isse aage kya hi likhta maii. Itni masti , nautanki and irritate mai sayaad hi kisi se huaa hungaa. Itne nighouts, games aur ghoomaa hai humlog nee that you became a important part of my life. Chlo accha hua jabardasti photo keechte rhete the tum ki finally mujhe adadt ho gyii. Itna jaldi mat gussa hua krro be and hopefully humlog kaafi trips mai jaayengee aaage and jitne maaje kiye hai usse jayda hi krrengee and mehnat krte rhena aur aage badte rheenaa ğŸ˜¬ğŸ˜¬
author: Prakhar  Srivastava

text: Lol I think I knew you way before you came to know me owing to some unethical means ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ and I was always feeling like a little detective which made Sarah life troublesome i guess ğŸ˜¬, I know we saw each other many times in the coaching but our first talk was after jee advanced in a messenger group aur jaise humlog ne baat krna chalu ki lag hi nhi rha thaa ki pheli baar baat krr rhe haii .... and utni jaldi hi humari ladiyaan bhi hoti thii jisme obv mai shi hota tha ğŸ˜ .... nevertheless I am happy those fights never affected us in the long run ...... jab bhi bore ya dhukhi hotaa thaa toh tum dono mili hi jaate the. Humlog ne itni baate ki hai ki now  it seems you know all the important bits of my life. Har do-teen haafto mai toh resturants pauch jaate the and jaipur mai ek din jo itni hassi ayyi thi LOL, woh antragini mai har cheez ghumne ka junoon And jo tumlogo ne meri hard-drive hi udaa di .... sab yaad hai mujhe ğŸ˜‘. I am happy that you can keep some little secrets of mine ğŸ™ƒ.  I know you have a strong determination to succeed and surely you will baas humlog milte rhee chahe khi bhi job hooo ...... ab ek saal tumlog ke bina bitana padegaa mujhee ğŸ˜£
author: Prakhar  Srivastava
